name: Tondeuse
description:
Little prototype from an old idea, i know there is some game about the same idea but this one is mine :)

Edit 2016.12.09:

  • Now grass regrowth.
  • Added some stone (in future this kill the lawn mower)

Edit 2016.12.01:

  • New terrain and now we can cut grass \o/
  • Removed the night and lights
